name: L2MS Instrument Detail
abstract: Laser-2 Mass Spectrometry cube data with ionization parameters
description:
# L2MS Instrument Detail

Laser-2 Mass Spectrometry cube data with ionization parameters.
annotatedSchema:
$schema: https://json-schema.org/draft/2020-12/schema
title: L2MS Instrument Detail
description: Laser-2 Mass Spectrometry cube data with ionization parameters
type: object
properties:
  '@type':
    const: ada:L2MSCube
  sampleName:
    type: string
  ionizationTimeDelay:
    type: integer
  massGate:
    type: boolean
  photoionizationWavelength:
    type: integer
  plasmaShutter:
    type: boolean
  timeDelayUnits:
    type: string
  wavelengthUnits:
    type: string
x-jsonld-prefixes:
  schema: http://schema.org/
  ada: https://ada.astromat.org/metadata/
